## Download

### macOS

**Apple Silicon (M1/M2/M3):**
- Download: [`BookReconciler-VERSION-arm64.dmg`](https://github.com/Post45-Data-Collective/openrefine-reconciliation-service/releases/download/vVERSION/BookReconciler-VERSION-arm64.dmg) (recommended)

**Intel Mac:**
- Download: [`BookReconciler-VERSION.dmg`](https://github.com/Post45-Data-Collective/openrefine-reconciliation-service/releases/download/vVERSION/BookReconciler-VERSION.dmg) (recommended)

**Installation:**
1. Open the `.dmg` file and drag BookReconciler to Applications
2. **Right-click** BookReconciler.app ‚Üí **Open** (first time only)
3. Click "Open" when macOS shows security warning (if needed)

**Note:** The app is code-signed and notarized by Apple. If you see a warning, it may be due to your security settings or the app being downloaded from a browser that doesn't preserve the quarantine attribute correctly.

### Windows

**Installer (recommended):**
- Download: [`BookReconciler-Setup-VERSION.exe`](https://github.com/Post45-Data-Collective/openrefine-reconciliation-service/releases/download/vVERSION/BookReconciler-Setup-VERSION.exe)
- Run the installer and follow the prompts
- Click "More info" ‚Üí "Run anyway" if Windows SmartScreen appears

**Portable version:**
- Download: [`BookReconciler-VERSION-win.zip`](https://github.com/Post45-Data-Collective/openrefine-reconciliation-service/releases/download/vVERSION/BookReconciler-VERSION-win.zip)
- Unzip and run `BookReconciler.exe`
